trans-unit.source: Provides behavior for the component tray of a designer.
trans-unit.target: 提供的行为来设计器组件栏。

trans-unit.source: The component tray represents components that do not otherwise provide a visible surface at design time and provides a way for users to access and set the properties of those components.
trans-unit.target: 组件栏表示不另外提供一个可视界面，在设计时的组件，并提供让用户访问和设置这些组件的属性的方法。

trans-unit.source: Some types of components, such as a <xref:System.Timers.Timer>, may not have a user interface that can be viewed at design time.
trans-unit.target: 某些类型的组件，如<xref:System.Timers.Timer>，可能没有一个用户界面，可以在设计时查看。</xref:System.Timers.Timer>

trans-unit.source: These components are usually represented by icons that are shown in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 这些组件通常由在组件栏中显示的图标表示。

trans-unit.source: The component tray is a rectangular region displayed at the bottom of the design view window while in design view mode, once it is active.
trans-unit.target: 组件栏是处于活动状态后在设计视图模式下，设计视图窗口的底部显示的矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: The component tray becomes active in design view after a component that is displayed in the component tray has been added to or is part of the current document.
trans-unit.target: 后，将显示在组件栏中的组件已添加到或属于当前文档，组件栏将设计视图中处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray"></xref> class using the specified designer and service provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray"></xref>类使用的指定设计器和服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The component tray monitors component additions and removals and displays appropriate user interface objects to represent the components it contains.
trans-unit.target: 组件栏监视组件的添加和删除，并显示相应的用户界面对象来表示它所包含的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner"></xref> that is the main or document designer for the current project.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner"> </xref> ，它是主或用于当前项目的文档设计器。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that can be used to obtain design-time services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IServiceProvider>可用来获取在设计时服务。</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Adds a component to the tray.
trans-unit.target: 将组件添加到栏。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to add to the tray.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>将添加到任务栏。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tray items are automatically aligned.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动对齐组件栏项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tray items are automatically arranged; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自动排列组件栏项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool can be used to create a new component.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以使用指定的工具创建新的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>测试。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified tool can be used to create a component; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的工具可以用于创建的组件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified component can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以显示指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: This method tests the specified component for the existence of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>, which indicates whether the component has a user interface that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法测试是否存在指定的组件<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>，可以显示指示组件是否具有的用户界面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>测试。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component can be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以显示组件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of components contained in the tray.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在托盘中的组件的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of components in the tray.
trans-unit.target: 在任务栏中的组件数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a component from the specified toolbox item, adds the component to the current document, and displays a representation for the component in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的工具箱项创建一个组件，将组件添加到当前文档中，在组件栏中显示该组件的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: This method checks the item for an appropriate <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> before attempting to create the component and add it to the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查是否具有相应的项<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>然后再尝试创建组件并将其添加到组件栏。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to create a component from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>若要创建的组件。

trans-unit.source: Displays an error message to the user with information about the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 有关指定异常的信息通过向用户显示一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception about which to display information.
trans-unit.target: 有关显示信息的异常。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the specified component, relative to the upper-left corner of the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的组件，相对于组件栏的左上角的位置。

trans-unit.source: GetLocation is an accessor method for the location extender property that is added to each component in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: GetLocation 是添加到组件栏中的每个组件的位置扩展程序属性的访问器方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to retrieve the location of.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>要检索的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the coordinates of the specified component, or an empty <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> if the specified component could not be found in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，该值指示指定的组件或为一个空的坐标<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>如果在组件栏中找不到指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> has an <xref:System.Drawing.Point.IsEmpty*> property equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and typically has <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> properties that are each equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>具有<> *1> 属性等于<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>&210;hz <> </> *1> 和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>每个等于&0; 的属性。</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>

trans-unit.source: Similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns the next component in the tray, given a starting component.
trans-unit.target: 类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，此方法返回的下一个组件栏中，给定起始组件中。

trans-unit.source: The component from which to start enumerating.
trans-unit.target: 从其开始枚举组件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enumerate forward through the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enumerate backward.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>用于向前循环访问列表;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>来向后枚举。

trans-unit.source: The next component in the component tray, or , if the end of the list is encountered (or the beginning, if forward is ).
trans-unit.target: 组件栏中的下一个组件或 ，如果遇到列表的末尾 (或开始时，如果 forward 是 )。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service type.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested service, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the service could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 请求的服务的实例或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到该服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""></xref> extender property.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""></xref>扩展程序属性。

trans-unit.source: The `Location` extender property is offered to all non-visual components.
trans-unit.target: `Location`扩展程序属性提供对所有非可视组件。

trans-unit.source: The returned value takes into account the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值将考虑在内的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>值

trans-unit.source: If `receiver` does not have a component view, the returned value is an empty <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`receiver`未没有组件视图，则返回的值是一个空<xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that receives the location extender property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>接收位置扩展程序属性。

trans-unit.source: A representing the location of receiver.
trans-unit.target: A 表示位置的 receiver 。

trans-unit.source: Tests a component for presence in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 在组件栏中测试存在的组件。

trans-unit.source: The component to test for presence in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 要测试其存在在组件栏中的组件。

trans-unit.source: if comp is being shown on the tray; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 comp 任务栏上显示; 否则为正在 。

trans-unit.source: Called when an object that has been dragged is dropped on the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 当在组件栏中删除已被拖动的对象时调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when an object is dragged over, and has entered the area over, the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象拖到，并且已通过，组件栏进入区域时调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when an object is dragged out of the area over the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 当将对象拖出区域通过组件栏时调用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>为事件提供数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when an object is dragged over the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 当对象拖动到组件栏上方时调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called during an OLE drag and drop operation to provide an opportunity for the component tray to give feedback to the user about the results of dropping the object at a specific point.
trans-unit.target: 在 OLE 过程中调用拖放操作，以提供组件栏，来向有关结果的特定点处删除对象的用户反馈的机会。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when a mouse drag selection operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标拖动选择操作被取消时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse is double clicked over the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标进行双在组件栏上单击时调用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>为事件提供数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 当按下鼠标按钮时调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse cursor position has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标光标位置已更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button has been released.
trans-unit.target: 当释放鼠标按钮时调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when the view for the component tray should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 组件栏的视图应该刷新时调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>为事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Called to set the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 调用以设置鼠标光标。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified component from the tray.
trans-unit.target: 从任务栏中删除指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to remove from the tray.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>从任务栏中删除。

trans-unit.source: Sets the location of the specified component to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件的位置设置为指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to set the location of.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>若要设置的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the new location for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，该值指示指定的组件的新位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""></xref> extender property.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""></xref>扩展程序属性。

trans-unit.source: The `Location` extender property is offered to all non-visual components.
trans-unit.target: `Location`扩展程序属性提供对所有非可视组件。

trans-unit.source: The actual value takes into account the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 实际值将考虑在内的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>值

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that receives the location extender property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>接收位置扩展程序属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> representing the location of `receiver`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>表示位置的`receiver`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tray displays a large icon to represent each component in the tray.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示任务栏是否显示大图标来表示在托盘中的每个组件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if large icons are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果显示大图标;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentTray>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要接收扩展程序属性。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此对象可以提供到指定的对象; 扩展程序属性否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>到进程。
